name: Hen-of-the-Woods Mushrooms
keywords: fall, hen of the woods mushroom, shallot, thyme, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves (no stems), finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Brush any soil off mushrooms; cut mushrooms into 1-inch dice.

Melt butter with oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. When butter stops sizzling, add mushrooms; sauté until tender, about 4 minutes. Add shallots, garlic, thyme, salt and pepper. Sauté 2 minutes and serve.
